# <a name="organizing-your-outlookcom-mailbox"></a><span data-ttu-id="06ea8-102">組織 Outlook.com 信箱</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06ea8-102">Organizing your Outlook.com mailbox</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06ea8-103">連絡人清單是電子郵件地址的集合，可將電子郵件傳送給一群人員使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06ea8-103">A contact list is a collection of email addresses, and is useful for sending email to a group of people.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="06ea8-104">若要建立連絡人清單：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06ea8-104">To create a contact list:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="06ea8-105">移至[人員](https://outlook.live.com/people/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06ea8-105">Go to [People](https://outlook.live.com/people/)</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /><span data-ttu-id="06ea8-106">.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06ea8-106">.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="06ea8-107">在頁面頂端，選取箭號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06ea8-107">At the top of the page, select the arrow</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="06ea8-108">在 [**新增連絡人**] 旁，然後選取 [**新增連絡人清單**]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06ea8-108">next to **New contact** and then select **New contact list**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="06ea8-109">輸入清單的名稱，然後新增名稱或電子郵件地址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06ea8-109">Enter a name for the list, and then add names or email addresses.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="06ea8-110">選取 [建立]\*\*\*\*。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06ea8-110">Select **Create**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06ea8-111">深入瞭解如何[在 Outlook.com 中建立、查看和編輯連絡人及連絡人清單](https://support.office.com/article/5b909158-036e-4820-92f7-2a27f57b9f01?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06ea8-111">Learn more about how to [create, view, and edit contacts and contact lists in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/5b909158-036e-4820-92f7-2a27f57b9f01?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
